segments.text: Yes , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to buy some specialties . Can you recommend me some ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I strongly advise you to buy a bottle of perfume and a lighter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . They look nice . I will take both of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a look at your passport , please ?
segments.speaker: S2
